arabicText: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
englishTranslation: In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

arabicText: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
englishTranslation: Verily, along with every hardship is relief.

arabicText: فَاذْكُرُونِي أَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوا لِي وَلَا تَكْفُرُونِ
englishTranslation: Therefore remember Me, I will remember you, and be grateful to Me and never be ungrateful to Me.

arabicText: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
englishTranslation: Then which of the Blessings of your Lord will you both deny?

arabicText: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
englishTranslation: Say: He is Allah, the One.

arabicText: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
englishTranslation: Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اذْكُرُوا اللَّهَ ذِكْرًا كَثِيرًا
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.

arabicText: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
englishTranslation: Allah burdens not a person beyond his scope.

arabicText: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
englishTranslation: And whosoever puts his trust in Allah, then He will suffice him.

arabicText: أَلَا بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ تَطْمَئِنُّ الْقُلُوبُ
englishTranslation: Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.

arabicText: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ادْعُونِي أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
englishTranslation: And your Lord said: Invoke Me, I will respond to your invocation.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Seek help in patience and the prayer. Truly, Allah is with the patient.

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي
englishTranslation: He said: O my Lord! Open for me my chest.

arabicText: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
englishTranslation: And We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

arabicText: وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ
englishTranslation: And He is with you wheresoever you may be.

arabicText: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا
englishTranslation: As for those who strive hard in Us, We will surely guide them to Our Paths.

arabicText: لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
englishTranslation: Despair not of the Mercy of Allah.

arabicText: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslation: So do not become weak, nor be sad, and you will be superior if you are indeed believers.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
englishTranslation: Only those who are patient shall receive their reward in full, without reckoning.

arabicText: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
englishTranslation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Fear Allah as He should be feared, and die not except as Muslims.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَلْتَنظُرْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ لِغَدٍ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has sent forth for tomorrow.

arabicText: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَائِقَةُ الْمَوْتِ ۗ وَإِنَّمَا تُوَفَّوْنَ أُجُورَكُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
englishTranslation: Every soul shall taste death. And you shall be paid in full your reward on the Day of Resurrection.

arabicText: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَاكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslation: Did you think that We created you in vain, and that you would not be returned to Us?

arabicText: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
englishTranslation: He who created death and life to test you as to which of you is best in deed.

arabicText: الْمَالُ وَالْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَالْبَاقِيَاتُ الصَّالِحَاتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ
englishTranslation: Wealth and children are the adornment of this worldly life, but the enduring good deeds are better with your Lord.

arabicText: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ ﴿١٤﴾ وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
englishTranslation: Successful indeed is he who purifies himself, and remembers the name of his Lord and prays.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ ۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا
englishTranslation: O mankind! Indeed the promise of Allah is true. So let not the worldly life delude you.

arabicText: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُ حَيَاةً طَيِّبَةً
englishTranslation: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while being a believer, We will surely cause them to live a good life.

arabicText: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
englishTranslation: And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن تَتَّقُوا اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّكُمْ فُرْقَانًا
englishTranslation: O you who believe! If you fear Allah, He will give you a criterion to distinguish right from wrong.

arabicText: وَاذْكُر رَّبَّكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ تَضَرُّعًا وَخِيفَةً وَدُونَ الْجَهْرِ مِنَ الْقَوْلِ بِالْغُدُوِّ وَالْآصَالِ
englishTranslation: And remember your Lord within yourself in humility and in fear, without being loud, in the morning and the evening.

arabicText: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ ﴿٧﴾ وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
englishTranslation: Whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it. And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.

arabicText: وَالْعَصْرِ ﴿١﴾ إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ ﴿٢﴾ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
englishTranslation: By Time! Indeed mankind is in loss, except those who believe, do good deeds, and advise each other to truth and patience.

arabicText: لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ ۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرْتُمْ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٌ
englishTranslation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you; but if you deny, indeed My punishment is severe.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ وَاخْشَوْا يَوْمًا لَّا يَجْزِي وَالِدٌ عَن وَلَدِهِ
englishTranslation: O mankind! Fear your Lord, and fear a Day when no father can avail his son, nor a son avail his father.

arabicText: أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ ﴿١﴾ حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
englishTranslation: Competition in worldly increase diverts you, until you visit the graves.

arabicText: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ ﴿١٠﴾ كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ ﴿١١﴾ يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslation: And indeed, over you are guardian angels, noble and recording. They know whatever you do.

arabicText: إِنَّ السَّمْعَ وَالْبَصَرَ وَالْفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُولَٰئِكَ كَانَ عَنْهُ مَسْئُولًا
englishTranslation: Indeed, the hearing, the sight, and the heart — about all those one will be questioned.

arabicText: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَزِينَةٌ وَتَفَاخُرٌ بَيْنَكُمْ
englishTranslation: Know that the life of this world is but amusement, diversion, adornment, and boasting among yourselves.

arabicText: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
englishTranslation: Indeed, We created man from a mixed drop to test him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا وَرَابِطُوا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Be patient, and excel in patience, and remain steadfast, and fear Allah, that you may be successful.

arabicText: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ وَاسْمَعُوا وَأَطِيعُوا وَأَنفِقُوا خَيْرًا لِّأَنفُسِكُمْ
englishTranslation: So fear Allah as much as you are able, and listen and obey and spend; it is better for yourselves.

arabicText: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ
englishTranslation: Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you.

arabicText: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
englishTranslation: And remember the Name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with complete devotion.

arabicText: وَاسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى الْخَاشِعِينَ
englishTranslation: And seek help through patience and prayer; and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَيْكُمْ رَقِيبًا
englishTranslation: Indeed, Allah is Ever-Watchful over you.

arabicText: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
englishTranslation: Every soul is retained for what it has earned.

arabicText: يَا بُنَيَّ إِنَّهَا إِن تَكُ مِثْقَالَ حَبَّةٍ مِّنْ خَرْدَلٍ فَتَكُن فِي صَخْرَةٍ أَوْ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَوْ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَأْتِ بِهَا اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٌ
englishTranslation: O my son! Indeed if a deed be the weight of a mustard seed, Allah will bring it forth. Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Aware.

arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَقُولُوا قَوْلًا سَدِيدًا ﴿٧٠﴾ يُصْلِحْ لَكُمْ أَعْمَالَكُمْ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ
englishTranslation: O you who believe! Fear Allah and speak a word directed to the right. He will amend your deeds and forgive your sins.
